notes: Brand new/newly renovated apartment with pristine white polished floors, modern kitchen with marble backsplash, built-in oven, and ample cabinetry. The unit appears unfurnished with excellent natural light from large windows. For baby safety: no visible balcony access in photos, smooth floors without stairs, and no sharp corners visible; however exposed ceiling pipes and the high floor (13F) warrant attention. Very clean condition overall.
